column4: I want to install Wine without having internet on the computer I'm installing it on. How would I do this?
you will need to grab all the dependancies from the web, you could start with wine then see what the packages moan about, then go grab that package and so on, very messy
Oh. Well. The other part is that strictly speaking I haven't installed ubuntu yet, either
that will show the log of packages install / removed etc
I've only seen that in the playdeb ppa
it's the thing listed in the xbox controller FAQ
I can't find one. Doesn't mean it doesn't exist. Apparently Ubuntu has tons of issues with hgview :(
did you self compile the module?
what if you run:  sudo modprobe hg
I'm assuming that's what it is, i don't use the app
the command-line program is called "hg", yes
